attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i dont think its fair for closing down a school that has been around for many years, also it plays a big part for the community and is a great school. The children think about them that are at the moment being educated there.

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.Your title and petition should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement, about Government policy.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
False or incomplete name or address information
